feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.7: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: API updates are altering records not included in the payload. #10473
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: limit Parameter Ignored in REST API #10435
  • [closed] Bug: Rollup a formula field #10429
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Formula that evaluates to boolean #9815
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Private minio cannot be used to download attachments #9590

What's Changed

  • fix: worker monaco by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10462
  • fix: Bulk update - order record list same as input data by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10476
  • fix: send table alias for rollup when column is formula by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10478
  • fix (nc-gui): false readonly checkbox still show empty square by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10468
  • refactor: add unsynced changes from ee by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10486
  • fix: broken is requested logic by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10472

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.6...0.260.7

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.0: NocoDB Grid 2.0 – Built for Speed, Even on Old Windows & Raspberry Pi!!
entry.content:
🚀 NocoDB : Feature Release

We heard you! Performance was a challenge, especially on older Windows systems and browsers. So, we completely rebuilt the NocoDB grid for an ultra-fast, seamless experience—even on Raspberry Pi setups.

What’s Changed?

  • :rocket: Rebuilt from the ground up – Say goodbye to sluggish interactions.
  • 🖼️ Canvas-powered rendering – No bloat, just pure speed.
  • :dash: Ultra-smooth on old Windows machines – Performance that just works.
  • :strawberry: Runs even on Raspberry Pi – Handle data anywhere, with no slowdowns.
  • :zap: We’re making NocoDB faster, leaner, and future-ready—so you can work without limits!

This is just the beginning of our performance journey. Try it out and experience the smoothest NocoDB grid yet! :rocket:

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Excel import error - Parameter 1 is not of type 'Blob' #10499
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Since NocoDB Version 0.260 attachment in mp3 format not playable #10492
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Geo data input NOT work from 0.260.6 #10487
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable To Re-Order Image Attachments: Results In Error "Field To Parse Image Data". #10483
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Search across all fields #10463
  • [trigger-CI] 🐛 Bug: Broken REST API in Russian language #10433
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Lookup field creation via fields menu fails #10423
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Email throws error when validation enabled #10422
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot scroll through base views on touchscreen devices, it reorders views instead #10346
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: In firefox, scrolling vertically in a record view is not available #10319
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Fist field in new table (Title) is not editable #10548
  • [closed] missing projects after changing redis to valkey #10530
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Alt + Left Arrow Shortcut Causes Data Loss #10513
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Excel import error - Parameter 1 is not of type 'Blob' #10499
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Since NocoDB Version 0.260 attachment in mp3 format not playable #10492
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Geo data input NOT work from 0.260.6 #10487
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable To Re-Order Image Attachments: Results In Error "Field To Parse Image Data". #10483
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: No auto attribution of columns if special characters when importing from file #10482
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cards with blocked movement in kanban view (when the view mode is locked) #10481
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Search across all fields #10463
  • [trigger-CI] 🐛 Bug: Broken REST API in Russian language #10433
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Lookup field creation via fields menu fails #10423
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Email throws error when validation enabled #10422
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot scroll through base views on touchscreen devices, it reorders views instead #10346
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: In firefox, scrolling vertically in a record view is not available #10319

What's Changed

  • fix: port in use on code change by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10507
  • Nc fix/image attachment reordering by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10493
  • make entire square clickable treat mp3 as video by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10501
  • can move cards if view is locked by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10510
  • make the video player has auto height instead of 100% by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10508
  • fix (nc-gui): fix url import and json string import by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10503
  • chore: sync import ft by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10509
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): Lookup field creation via fields menu fails by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10512
  • feat: add query based filter support in view url by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10511
  • feat: cloud exp by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10504
  • Nc feat/auto add select option by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10517
  • refactor: add type definitions to formula query builders by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10479
  • chore: sync various by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10519
  • feat: Improved Grid View by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10520
  • fix: feature preview height to be same as toolbar by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10522
  • fix: block api token access to meta-diff by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10480
  • fix: square bracket rich text by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10526
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): disable draggable/sortable component reordering in touch based devices by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10505
  • Nc fix/rich perf by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10528
  • feat: optimize number of api calls by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10525
  • fix(nc-gui): instead of rendering multiple lookup attachment cell render only 1 by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10518
  • fix(nc-gui): expand row issue in canvas by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10535
  • docs: update comments for coming soon items by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10537
  • feat: enable canvas for mobile mode by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10536
  • fix: edit interaction for url, date and attachment by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10539
  • Nc feat/canvas formula url by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10541
  • fix(nc-gui): disable expanded form keyboard navigation if any input is active/focused by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10551
  • Nc canvas fixes 2 by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10545
  • fix: mouseup listener not working properly by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10552
  • fix: canvas related issues by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10538

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.7...0.262.0

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Disorder in the record creation card within a related field. #10631
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Description popup disabled. #10630
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Upload CSV should skip system fields #10617
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Can't copy past value to "many-to-many" field #10613
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Form View with Attachment and Links Field, entry triggers "Failed to load list" #10608
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Increase file upload size to 512MB to support big files #10595
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: String to currency transformation is broken #10593
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: The import date field doesn't respect the chosen format for all dates #10584
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: commenter role, checkbox data is not displayed #10581
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Gridview 2.0 has reversed columns in Firefox (v135) #10577
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Clean S3 object when we remove attachment from a row #10575
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: export a base #10574
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Dark Mode #10573
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Paste in MM cell of canvas table throw Maximum call stack error #10571
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Can not paste text to the search box on the right side #10570
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Formula field empty but displayed correctly in the linked field #10567
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Group by Pagination limit #10566
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Upload of .tif not possible #10564
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Shift + scroll is not working on Grid View 2.0 #10560
  • [closed] No Thumbnails shown with docker and nginx SSL reverse proxy #10554
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Enable to click one to one relational records in expanded view #10546
  • [closed] Development Setup - Backend server doesn't start due to sqlite binding issue #10544
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Reorder fields displayed in List Linked Records list #10527
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Values ​​in "link type columns" with "one-to-one" and "one-to-many" connections are no longer clickable. #10524
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: changes in user management authority #10516
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: CSV import -> meta API col to decimal -> filtering still on the STRING basis #10515
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Add duration formatting to formula fields #10506
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: CSV import using URL - this.source.map is not a function #10498
  • [closed] Improvement: wider import data modal (web responsive) #10497
  • [closed] Button "Fill Form" is not translated / survey mode #10491
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Click on a linked entry does nothing #10471
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: When editing single select and multi-select field options, allow to sort them alphabetically #10461
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable to delete form #10295
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement] Feature: Linked Records List are not sorted in the order of records in table #10246
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Table Migration Between Bases #10210
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Slow performance on Grid View (Using 2gb of ram in Chrome) #10194
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: NocoDB Cloud Sign In Issue - Cannot resolve 'signin' Error 500 #10120
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: On refresh only reload the records shown through filter. #10061
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: AppWrite integration #10020
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Allow ordering linked records in relationships (e.g., many-to-many) #9916
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: add ArvanCloudS3 to Storage Services #9737
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Can't add new record if group by is enabled & all records are filtered out #9715
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: be able to allow or deny access to views by user #9711
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Limit options in form view for "linked records" field #9655
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: can't signin in self-hosted #9568
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Kanban stacks are expandable in Locked view mode #9554
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Install worked but cannot find my server. #9507
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: "Sign up for free" as optional / configurable in Shared view #9474
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Scope at Migration #9442
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Ability to develop/extend custom field types #9440
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: PDFs are not getting migrated when airtable migration is happening #9402
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: The plus icon and minus icon clicked Invalid when share base with editing access #9356
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Content disposition header is not getting applied for certain Storage Plugins #9350
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Record not found #9345
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: share base with editing access,the relationship fields can also be edited #9336
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: attempting to upgrade docker container nocodb/nocodb:latest fails on migration file "nc_054_id_length" #9315
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Not Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: placeholder Cover Image is shown even though it is not configured #9296
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: SQLite missing in integrations page #9251
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Admin panel with support for Email & Storage configuration #9208
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: format and display grid value with custom rules. #9191
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Duplicate shared base Workspace editor not allowed #9115
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Ability to change view without sidebar #9111
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Date quick select by entering digits #9110
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] can't query database #9109
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Supabase Storage - NEW PLUGIN #8999
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] [Feature] Add Support for Wasabi #8975
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🐘 DB : Postgres] 🐛 Bug: Unable to Recognize Foreign Keys When Connecting as a Regular User #8960
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Automatically add single or multi-select options on import #8911
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Increase limit of single/multi select options to 1000 #8907
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: "Duplicate column alias" error with Airtable API quick import #8798
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: singleselect import on external postgres #8770
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: "Email me" option in form view should work without explicit SMPT configuration in cloud #8700
  • [closed] Bug : Identifier name is too long when creating relation between tables #8692
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Metadata sync from MySQL ignores enum changes #8679
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Function to Show/Hide M2M Junction tables has no effect #8639
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Meta API docs need fix when working with ws/base #8612
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot connect to Google Cloud Storage #8534
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: no way to save "false" for boolean field #8473
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Google Cloud Storage integration not allowing download objet #8424
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: How to chat with obsidian and ollama（local language model）？ #8374
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Support copy/paste of multiple cells #8342
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Incorrect sorting of Cyrillic data #8331
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Database audit and log size should be limit or split. #8280
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: MultiSelect can read possible values based on what exists in the Datasource #8009
  • [closed] OVH storage wrong links🐛 Bug: #7724
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Image is not showing when storage plugin is GCS #7721
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Kanban (read-only sharing) - empty details in card #7656
  • [closed] Where is the documentation for authentication User API? How can I make requests that let me modify the Users? (Not base users) #7637
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Sort enum (select options) based on list order #7538
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Typing in linked fields #7517
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Timeout acquiring a connection. The pool is probably full. Are you missing a .transacting(trx) call? #7263
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable to set GeoData fields in API calls, get GeoData field values in Webhooks #7225
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot set GeoData column type using current location filled by browser due to precision error #7219
  • [📞 Status: Need Internal Discussion] Session Length Environment Variable? #7167
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unique Constraint on Combined Relations Fails #6957
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Blank dashboard #6839
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Exception error (force close NocoDB) #6698
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Authorization Issue (Digital Ocean / DockerHUB) #6671
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Can not add values to foreign key columns of external tables. #6562
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Have an external log for viewing the import errors #6529
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Can't add data to created columns in m2m table #6412
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: External database source, unable to retrieve field contents other than the primary key when setting the web hook option to insert new data #6365
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: can't add records when it contains a linked table field that is a required column in postgres #6322
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Can’t input a new record from form view #6208
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Filter query #5495
  • [closed] [Feature] Set Configuration Locked but not the Tables' Cells #5374
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cant add new option to "singleSelect" when is pk #5371
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Autogenerate UUID/CUID on Cells #4964
  • [🔎 Status: More Info Needed] 🐛 Bug: Corrupted File column data leads to zero records being displayed #4709
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] [Feature] Errors happening in webhooks should be surfaced to UI #4161
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Tables actions (copy, truncate, move) #4143
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][🔭 Scope : Project] [Feature] Read only value from API type #2906
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][👓 Scope : View] [Feature]: Copy Paste multiple cells of same type #1515
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][🍰 Scope : Column] 🔦 Feature: Geolocation column type #1133
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][🍰 Scope : Column] [Feature] Add comments to table columns #846
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][🍰 Scope : Column] [Feature] More options for uploading attachment files, referencing external URLs as attachments #842
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][👓 Scope : View] Feature: Dynamic Form Fields based on another table's data #761
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][👓 Scope : View] Restrict file access #675
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement][🔦 Type: Feature][👋 For : Community or Good First Issue][🍰 Scope : Column] 🔦 Feature: Number mask #204
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][👓 Scope : View] Feature : Spreadsheet : Support Personal View #144

What's Changed

  • docs: remove inaccessible link by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10561
  • fix: create view keyboard events should not affect the canvas when ex… by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10562
  • fix(nc-gui): on paste in mm cell max call stack error by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10572
  • docs: Super admin credential update env details by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10576
  • fix: field ordering in ltar fields by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10543
  • fix: don't apply filtering for the assumed default view by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10579
  • fix (nc-gui): data type string when operator is & sign by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10569
  • chore: add onlyBuiltDependencies to support pnpm v10 by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10559
  • Nc refactor/sqlui static removal by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10580
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10585
  • fix(nc-gui): On open edit formula field dropdown throw error if formula column default meta is missing by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10588
  • Add block-duration option in config - sync pr by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10583
  • fix(nc-gui): system fields value is empty in expanded form even if show system field is enabled from field menu by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10587
  • add Time as formatting when formula datatype result is number by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10549
  • fix: remove unused type validation for links by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10597
  • style: fix qrcode and multiselect lookup styles in expanded form by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10598
  • fix: global search should allow paste by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10600
  • fix: limit the number to safe integers by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10599
  • fix: column order is different in firefox by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10578
  • fix: sidebar node rename paste by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10602
  • Nc fix/common bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10591
  • handle geodata paste by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10589
  • fix: add new row clickable area by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10606
  • fix(nc-gui): Kanban stacks are expandable in Locked view mode by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10604
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10610
  • fix: kanban related issues by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10616
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10615
  • fix: keyboard interactions in extensions by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10611
  • revert[06bb1aa]: Remove promotion of aaPanel/BaoTa. by @VergeDX in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10470
  • Update 030.expand-record.md by @dalekirkwood in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9796
  • fix: role bug by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10621
  • feat(nix/docker/aio): init by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10474
  • fix: can't add new record if group by is enabled & all records are filtered out by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10624
  • fix: integration and model name truncation by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10619
  • Nc fix: blacklist several Uidt as target column by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10622
  • fix: Generate custom index name to avoid identifier length related errors by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10632
  • able to use created / last modified time as rollup by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10625
  • fix: Meta-diff - Identify changes in MySQL SET/ENUM types by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10636
  • fix: cache view columns request in useSmartsheetStore by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10633
  • fix: custom scroll behaviour for windows by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10637
  • fix (nc-gui): excel date format during upload by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10628
  • use same conversion for lat long limit input into 10 digit after decimal by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10620
  • Squashed commit of the following: by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10634
  • fix (nocodb): column update, detect dt based on uidt if dt is not provided by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10555
  • fix: tests by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10640
  • fix: expanded form data is not loading by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10639
  • fix: double click on col resize shouldn't open column edit modal by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10641
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10638
  • Nc fix: On click link record item chip expand record by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10607
  • 0.262.1 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10645

New Contributors

  • @dalekirkwood made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9796

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.262.0...0.262.1

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Row Filtered Creates Row Artifact/Ghost #10758
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: upload a csv file in existing table with FK fields to other #10754
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Error "FilterChildrenList" - Editor users not allowed to use filter groups. #10741
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Date-Time Lookup Field Displays Incorrect Time && Format difference in lookup #10736
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Upload csv / excel sometimes stuck on loading #10713
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Images are not showed on grid view #10712
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: if i make a lookup column where the "lookup field" is a link, it doesn't show in the grid view #10710
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Upload CSV failing to import the file: document.fonts.values() is not iterable #10709
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Syntax error in REGEX_REPLACE causes Table to completely CRASH & Cannot Export CSV #10708
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Image Preview Crops to Square Instead of Maintaining Aspect Ratio #10702
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: audit log do not retrieved correctly for composite pk #10700
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: URL formatted formula field does not open URL on click in grid view #10697
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Audit log for update do not recorder for external connection #10691
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: error "No record found" #10689
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: has-many self link, unable to create BT relation #10688
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: No auto attribution of columns if special characters when importing from file #10686
  • [🔎 Status: More Info Needed] Feature Request: Better Error Message for Importing Data into Existing Table with Single Select Field Containing Undefined Choice (Impossible to import any csv, xlsx or ods file if not) #10685
  • [closed] how to change language? help wanted #10675
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: links no records linked #10665
  • [Status: Not Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: duplicating a project ends with error and all of the views are lost #10657
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Webhook condition with "is blank" on a User-type field fails to trigger. #10655
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Geo Input field is NOT working in Form #10650
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: In expanded record from kanban view - unable to save edited data (for editor role) #10614
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Support for Handlebars Helpers (e.g., eq) in Webhooks and Other Features #10534
  • [Status: Not Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Kanban view expand record order #10521
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: blank / empty filter error on json field #10452
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Failing xls/csv imports #10421
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Parentheses support in where query param #10385
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Currency numbers are not formatted correctly when displayed on the card. #10298
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Rows Inserted via REST API Not Visible in Kanban View #10057
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Want to paste Google Map geo data to geo data column directly. #9908
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: SUM fails if field is blank #9876
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: (ExternalDB) PDF attachments served from s3 have wrong domain configured in nocodb cloud #9821
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Inquiry Regarding Data Import Issue for Existing Table #9814
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Allow expand cell option for formula field when content length is more #9564
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: limit ignored in api #9513
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: "Records to link" not showing details in forms #9347
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Forms autoconvert markdown but won't parse code blocks #9172
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Use "created time" and "last modified time" in Rollup #9114
  • [closed] Nested logic as query parameter #8835
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Convert Formula column to other type #7639
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Export to Excel via API #7215
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: inserting links with sort enabled for lookup #7185
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: The response view does not see a pagination bar on Android's Edge #7042
  • [🏗️ Status: In Resolution][🌞 Scope : Data source] 🐛 Bug: Expanded view is empty #6682
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Connection terminated #5417

What's Changed

  • fix: Prevent sum from failing if field is blank by @Bchenjamin in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9977
  • chore(deps): bump path-to-regexp and express in /packages/nc-cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10001
  • Release 0.262.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10647
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10648
  • Formula builder type corrections by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10649
  • chore: bump deps by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10646
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): remove link mark on adding space at the end by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10654
  • fix: geodata form input broken by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10653
  • fix user blank not working in webhook by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10658
  • fix: signed url not working for s3 based providers by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10651
  • Nc feat: figma css variables by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10660
  • set default dt for each imported column if not exists by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10661
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10656
  • feat(nix/docker/aio/ssl): support for adhoc certs by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10666
  • feat: badged formula lookup by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10664
  • fix: rich text font weight by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10663
  • fix: formula URL format click by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10673
  • feat: sync fw by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10671
  • fix: excel export using api by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10644
  • Nc fix prod issues by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10674
  • Nc feat/linked fields page designer by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10676
  • feat (nocodb): add handlebar helpers to webhook template by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10629
  • fix: add validation for ? and $ symbol in table name #4564 by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10626
  • Nc fix/extension cleanup by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10679
  • fix: ltar follow model / view sort by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10680
  • Nc feat/query filter parser by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10683
  • fix: Self link BT link issue in expanded form by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10695
  • fix: No-record found error in expanded form by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10694
  • fix: upload title matching by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10693
  • fix: apply limit when querying from api by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10668
  • feat: change formula column to single line text while retaining data by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10627
  • Nc fix: confirm before leaving shared view/base by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10618
  • Nc fix/external db audit log by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10701
  • Nc fix/locked view by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10677
  • fix: do not show invalid tooltip over url field if it is empty by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10714
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): use object-fit contain property to render attachment cell by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10706
  • Nc canvas related issues by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10711
  • fix: Sanitise string literals in formula by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10718
  • fix: Handle row ID of audit record for tables with composite primary keys by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10704
  • fix: last week of decemeber is cut off by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10716
  • fix: Formula - Check for circular reference by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10720
  • fix: Handle missing searchPath value while merging config by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10722
  • Nc feat: column helper setup by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10652
  • fix: unref potential open handles by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10730
  • fix: add missing optional chain by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10732
  • fix: duplicate for columns with comma by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10731
  • Nc fix/currency number format in expanded form by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10719
  • fix(nc-gui): prevent select value on type in input if input box is already focused by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10735
  • fix: use custom shutdown hook for long polling connections by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10733
  • fix: Handle rendering of Lookup to HM/MM column in grid by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10738
  • fix: local port hang issue by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10745
  • chore(nc-gui): lint by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10750
  • fix: clear calendar range if one col is updated by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10727
  • Fix (nc-gui): upload dialog sometimes stuck on loading spinner by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10715
  • fix: after import, do not set incorrect column as display value from frontend by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10699
  • chore: bump rspack by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10744
  • fix: Row artifact/ghost row. by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10761
  • fix: update filter value if select options are updated by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10755
  • fix: on field update trigger filter reload by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10764
  • fix: invalid filter acl by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10751
  • fix(nc-gui): disable horizontal scroll in lookup cell by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10734
  • add import getRenderAsTextFunForUiType by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10769
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10687
  • fix: datetime lookup bug by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10770
  • Nc fix/condition column name amb by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10771
  • Nc Fix: Allow expand cell option for formula field when content length is more by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10759
  • Nc Fix: Only display value field info is visible in link record dropdown of form view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10749
  • chore(nc-gui): lint by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10775
  • Sync missing changes by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10777
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10778
  • fix: filters for json by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10723
  • Nc feat/formula change column audit by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10780
  • allow foreign key to be imported by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10773
  • Nc fix/string too long error by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10779
  • track different injected row when link / unlink by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10774
  • Nc feat/filter error handling by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10781
  • chore: bump sentry and posthog by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10785
  • Nc Fix: ExtDB / SQL View fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10739
  • feat: move info message to i18n and add tooltip by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10787
  • Nc fix: trim whitespace of single select cell value on type conversion by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10724
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10783
  • 0.262.2 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10788

New Contributors

  • @Bchenjamin made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9977

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.262.1...0.262.2

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.5: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: cloud flare r2 Attachment file url encoded multi times #10922
  • [🟠 Priority: High] 🐛 Bug: OSS Docker image error #10905
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Detection and Conversion of ENUM/Check-Constrained Text Columns to Single Select #10897
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Nested formulas do not work in version 0.262.2 #10885
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: upload CSV error with single select fields #10884
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Include "user" fields in webhook #10881
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Typing dates into date column with format DD/MM/YYYY rejects values with DD>12 when hitting Tab #10877
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: expanded record next record navigation doesn't work #10868
  • [closed] 🔦 Enhancement: Expanded record title abrupt truncation #10865
  • [closed] 🔦 Enhancement: UI Bug - Calendar view sidebar record display image #10864
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Upload popup window closes 'Create and Link' window after file uploaded #10859
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Use lookup in concat formula #10852
  • [closed] 🔦 Enhancement: Creating kanban view for table with no attachment still includes image area in record card #10840
  • [closed] 🔦 Enhancement: Gallery view creation without attachment field #10839
  • [closed] Does it support the development of front-end plugins，such data charts? #10832
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Import base from other public nocodb bases #10818
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: percent field, 0 is displayed as empty cell #10813
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🔦 Feature: cannot use the link toward a URL when opening linked table. #10812
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: CONCAT() and URL() mangling fields with question marks #10800
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement] 🐛 Bug: No red point for obligatory field #10798
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Importing linked field stopped working #10768
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: app.nocodb Issues 2 #10748
  • [closed] Percent field - Progress Indicator #10737
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Live Row Filtering not working with Lookup Field as 2nd AND #10728
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable to Reopen Menu After Hiding on 'Integrations' Tab #10705
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Click disabled in Related Fields #10681
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Link modal field order different from table order of originating table #10662
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: (Self-hosted minio) minio imageurl broken missing bucket name in the url returned from nocodb #10592
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: experiencing compatibility issues with material-symbols in the browser. #10568
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Grouping bugs in gridview 2.0 #10563
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Create record using form with link and default id not link the record #10550
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: (Self-hosted digital-ocean-storage) : Uploading large files in digital ocean spaces storage fails #10484
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Table renaming allows special chars like "?", "$" #10477
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: [mobile] create table throws error #10467
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: (Self-hosted storage): Images don't load if there's whitespace in filename (R2?) #10373
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Date for DD/MM/YYYY format #10296
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Create Table API Call Strips Spaces and Underscore from Column Names #9438
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Hide RO columns in new form #9312
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Make references clickable #9165
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: REST API where parameter with null check on date fields #9157
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: for self HM links, lookup field doesn't list BT #9059
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: The timezone of createdtime and updatedtime haven‘t been translate #8593
  • [Status: Not Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Broken styles for mobile layout #8531
  • [Status: Not Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: [mobile] Cell data not displayed in shared view #8515
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: ctrl + f not working anymore #8489
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: When M2M Link type column is created in the table linking to itself (the same table), it does not show up in Swagger #8463
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: 当表的名称中有特殊字符时会出错！ #8313
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Android browser missing option to navigate grid view pages #8232
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: baseUpdate - Base Editor: Not allowed #8194
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: (Self-hosted) Webhook between Docker containers on the same private network fails with unhelpful error message. #7644
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: LinkToAnotherRecord fields are not showing if string is empty #7184
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: List linked records in shared view not clickable #7096
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Email Notification allways blank #7016
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unable to Make Column Unique via API Call #7003
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Optimisation of expanded view with Links fields which are SingleSelect #6270
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][🍰 Scope : Column] [Feature] Multiselect > option auto-populate values from column rows #1036
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement][🔦 Type: Feature][👋 For : Community or Good First Issue][🍰 Scope : Column] URL columns should accept file:// protocol #746
  • [🏗️ Status: In Resolution] 🐛 Bug: Group by on look up fields fails for this usecase #10950
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: row’s audit log not working #10948
  • [Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Search in links field doesn't work anymore #10940
  • [Status: Not Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Cmd K not working properly #10935
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Error with paste exceeding rows available #10934
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Page Loading Error #10916
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Share button in views not working properly anymore #10899
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Upload excel issue with arabic character in column name #10833
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unintended filter from related table views applied for linked records #10962
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Search filter is not working on many-to-one relational field #10949

What's Changed

  • Release 0.262.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10791
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10792
  • fix: ws user invite notification is not shown in ui by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10789
  • fix: query filter with parser by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10796
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10793
  • Enable data audit for external db(ee) by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10804
  • fix: Fix user field filter behavior for 'Lookup' type by @ssweber in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10757
  • fix: R2 and Spaces related bug by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10806
  • fix: required field indicator by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10807
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10808
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): LongText modal size changes on visible by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10809
  • Nc fix: Miscellaneous bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10803
  • Handle nested lookup in filter by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10811
  • fix: hook ctrl f with grid search by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10810
  • fix: sqlite invalid format for DD/MM/YYYY format by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10794
  • Nc fix/formula question mark by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10814
  • fix(nc-gui): expanded form issue and kanban view test fail issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10815
  • Nc fix: Minor bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10802
  • fix(nc-gui): ltar item chip click issue in canvas by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10821
  • fix(test): kanban view test fail issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10822
  • fix: pass exclusion properly to hooks- by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10816
  • Nc fix/raw concated formula by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10828
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10824
  • feat: mail templates by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10760
  • Nc fix/decimal scientific notation by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10805
  • Nc fix/personal view followup by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10826
  • fix: Reset password page - proper error handling by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10776
  • fix: progress bar not shown in several places by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10784
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10841
  • fix: templates minor fixes by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10845
  • Nc fix: url cell related bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10842
  • Nc fix/quick import error by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10848
  • fix: color is not updating by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10847
  • Nc refactor/prepare nested link qb by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10849
  • Nc Fix: Rich text doesn't wrap for change in row height by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10837
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10846
  • Nc misc by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10851
  • Nc fix/filter date null by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10797
  • fix (nocodb): perform convertDateTime to created and last modified time by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10835
  • Nc chore/fp nc migration by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10854
  • test: update filter add button selector by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10858
  • Nc Fix: Same record can be opened multiple times simultaneously in Expanded Form by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10855
  • Mark formula as invalid if circular ref detected by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10857
  • fix: replace initially loading material font icons with svg icons by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10844
  • send table alias for lookup formula by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10862
